title: A Letter to the Faithful from Team Reporter Briana
body_text:
A Letter to the Faithful from Team Reporter Briana
Briana Jeannel
Dear Faithful,
Growing up in the Bay Area, Sundays meant one thing: 49ers football. Some of my earliest memories are of gamedays at Candlestick Park, sitting in the stands, cheering on my hometown team alongside my family, and feeling like I was part of something bigger than myself. Those moments became a part of who I am. When Levi's Stadium was built, I saw it rise from the ground up. Now, it's a place I'm proud to call home.
Today, I'm beyond grateful to officially step into my new role as the San Francisco 49ers team reporter. This is more than a job for me, it's a dream rooted in childhood memories, family traditions, and a lifelong love for this team and its fans.
Since joining the organization in 2021, I've had the honor of working alongside incredible storytellers like Keiana Martin and Lindsey Pallares, two women who've represented the 49ers with grace, talent, and heart. I'm proud to help carry on the thoughtful and passionate storytelling that defines this team.
Over the years, I've grown alongside this team, celebrating incredible highs and witnessing the unforgettable moments that define what it means to be a part of the 49ers. I share a heart with this team and with the Faithful, the best fanbase in the NFL. Your unwavering passion, loyalty, and love for this franchise inspire everything we do.
As I step into this role, I'm committed to doing things the "Forty Niner Way:" with heart, excellence, and a deep respect for the legacy of this team. I'm honored and humbled to help tell the stories that make this organization so special, and I can't wait for what's ahead.
Let's do this!
With love and gratitude,
Briana
